net.sf.jclal.util.xml

Class XMLConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.util.xml.AbstractXMLConfiguration
      • net.sf.jclal.util.xml.XMLConfigurationBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IXMLConfigurationBuilder

    public class XMLConfigurationBuilder
extends AbstractXMLConfiguration
implements IXMLConfigurationBuilder
    Utility class to construct a xml configuration file to execute an experiment.
    Author:
    Oscar Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
